message.content:
cs.DC, cs.AR, cs.PF, cs.PL, cs.SY

Reasoning: The paper focuses on evaluating the performance of advanced features in CUDA Unified Memory, which is a topic related to distributed computing (cs.DC) and parallel computing (cs.AR). The benchmark suite used in the experiments stresses the memory system, which is a topic related to performance evaluation (cs.PF). The paper also discusses the impact of different CPUs, GPUs, and interconnects, which is a topic related to programming languages (cs.PL) and systems and control (cs.SY).
